insert into ps_cover_info
duration, er_no, er_name, currency, exchange_rate, group_ids, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time,
#{duration}, #{erNo}, #{erName}, #{currency}, #{exchangeRate}, #{groupIds}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime},
